resetLocalDataTitle: Deletes all chats, keys and settings

keyAlmostEmptyMessage: Your sending key is almost exhausted
refillKeyMessage: Refill it in person with your contact to send messages.

scanStatusNotReadableError: Maybe camera is already in use.

pushNotificationsDeniedMessage: Permission denied – it can be granted via browser notification settings.
deleteAllMessagesLocallyTitle: Sure you want to delete all messages in this chat?
notificationPermissionNotSupported: Push notifications are not supported by this browser environment.
notificationPermissionNotSupportedIos: Select "Add to Home Screen" in the Safari sharing sheet to add Vernam to your home screen and open it from there as app from now on.
notificationPermissionNotSupportedAndroi: Select "Add to Home screen" in the Google Chrome menu to add Vernam to your home screen and open it from there as app from now on.
notificationPermissionNotSupportedOther: Open Vernam in Safari on your iPhone or Chrome on your Android device.
introText:
Vernam is no ordinary messenger app.

To exchange messages with a contact, you must meet in person and load a shared random key. Each time you send a message, part of the key is used once to encrypt the message.

This guarantees perfect end-to-end encryption, which is even more secure than conventional messengers such as Signal, WhatsApp or Telegram.
lastOwnMessageNotExistsError: Last own message does not exist.
refillKeyActionSheetHeader: Refill key - what is your part?
